# **EVS 3000L Map Tutorial**

This tutorial explains how to set up an interactive map using **Leaflet.js** and **Esri Leaflet** in JavaScript.

We will:
- Initialize a Leaflet map.
- Add OpenStreetMap and CartoDB base layers.
- Overlay Florida county boundaries.

---

## **Step 1: Basic HTML Structure**

Here’s what a simple HTML structure looks like:

```
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <title>EVS 3000L</title>
</head>
<body>
    <p>Hello, EVS!</p>
</body>
</html>

```

## **Step 4: Initialize Leaflet Map**

```
<html>
<head>
    <title>Leaflet Map</title>
</head>

    <div id="mapid"></div>

    <script>
        var mymap = L.map('mapid').setView([29.7993, -82.7728], 8.8);
    </script>
</body>
</html>

```



---
## **Step 5: Add Base Layers**


```
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <title>Leaflet Base Layers</title>

    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://unpkg.com/leaflet/dist/leaflet.css" />
    <script src="https://unpkg.com/leaflet/dist/leaflet.js"></script>

    <style>
        #mapid {
            height: 100vh;
            width: 100%;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <div id="mapid"></div>

    <script>
        var mymap = L.map('mapid').setView([29.7993, -82.7728], 8.8);

        var earth = L.tileLayer('https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png', {
            maxZoom: 19,
            attribution: 'Map data © OpenStreetMap'
        }).addTo(mymap);

        var darkGrey = L.tileLayer('https://{s}.basemaps.cartocdn.com/dark_all/{z}/{x}/{y}{r}.png', {
            maxZoom: 19,
            attribution: '© CARTO'
        });

        L.control.layers({
            "Earth": earth,
            "Dark": darkGrey
        }).addTo(mymap);
    </script>
</body>
</html>

```




---
## **Step 6: Add Feature Layers**


```
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <title>Leaflet Feature Layer</title>

    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://unpkg.com/leaflet/dist/leaflet.css" />
    <script src="https://unpkg.com/leaflet/dist/leaflet.js"></script>
    <script src="https://unpkg.com/esri-leaflet"></script>

    <style>
        #mapid {
            height: 100vh;
            width: 100%;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <div id="mapid"></div>

    <script>
        var mymap = L.map('mapid').setView([29.7993, -82.7728], 8.8);

        var featureLayer = L.esri.featureLayer({
            url: 'https://services.arcgis.com/LBbVDC0hKPAnLRpO/arcgis/rest/services/Florida_County_Lines/FeatureServer/0',
            where: "NAME IN ('Alachua', 'St. Johns', 'Duval', 'Levy')"
        }).addTo(mymap);
    </script>
</body>
</html>

```
